channel.title: Learn Hebrew Pod - Learn Conversational Hebrew by Podcasts and Audio Lessons
channel.description: Learn Hebrew Pod - The first conversational Hebrew course by podcasts. Learn to speak conversational Hebrew the way it is spoken in Israel. Practice your Hebrew pronunciation and accent while expanding your vocabulary and conversational skills with sabra native Israeli teachers. Suitable for all levels
channel.itunes:subtitle: Learn Hebrew Pod - The first conversational Hebrew course by podcasts. Learn to speak conversational Hebrew the way it is spoken in Israel. Practice your Hebrew pronunciation and accent while expanding your vocabulary and conversational skills with sabra
channel.itunes:author: Jonathan Sternberg
channel.itunes:summary: Learn Hebrew Pod - The first conversational Hebrew course by podcasts. Learn to speak conversational Hebrew the way it is spoken in Israel. Practice your Hebrew pronunciation and accent while expanding your vocabulary and conversational skills with sabra native Israeli teachers. Suitable for all levels
channel.itunes:keywords: Hebrew, Israel, learn hebrew, hebrew lessons, conversational hebrew, hebrew lesons, judaism, biblical hebrew, bible, ivrit, jerusalem, ibru
channel.media:keywords: Hebrew, Israel, learn hebrew, hebrew lessons, conversational hebrew, hebrew lesons, judaism, biblical hebrew, bible, ivrit, jerusalem, ibru

item.title: 01 - Shalom - Basic Introduction
item.description: Shalom - Basic Introduction - Liat and Eran, our two Israelis, meet for the first time. In this first lesson of our Beginner’s Hebrew course, you will learn how to ask someone’s name and greet them in Hebrew.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Shalom - Basic Introduction - Liat and Eran, our two Israelis, meet for the first time. In this first lesson of our Beginner’s Hebrew course, you will learn how to ask someone’s name and greet them in Hebrew.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 02 - Morning Encounter
item.description: Morning Encounter - Start your day with “good morning” and a little Hebrew chit-chat. After this Hebrew podcast lesson, you’ll be ready for a casual meeting with a new Israeli friend.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Morning Encounter - Start your day with “good morning” and a little Hebrew chit-chat. After this Hebrew podcast lesson, you’ll be ready for a casual meeting with a new Israeli friend.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 03 - What Do You Do?
item.description: What Do You Do? - Do you work? Or maybe study? Maybe both? What is your field? In this lesson, we’ll be learning the Hebrew words to answer all these questions!
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: What Do You Do? - Do you work? Or maybe study? Maybe both? What is your field? In this lesson, we’ll be learning the Hebrew words to answer all these questions!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 04 - Nationality and Language
item.description: Nationality and Language - Every year, people from around the globe visit Israel. What is your nationality? What languages do you speak? (We know Hebrew will soon be on the list!)
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Nationality and Language - Every year, people from around the globe visit Israel. What is your nationality? What languages do you speak? (We know Hebrew will soon be on the list!)
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 05 - Days of the Week
item.description: Days of the Week - In this Hebrew conversation you will learn the Hebrew names for the days of the week while finding out whether Eran will accept Liat’s invitation to see a movie.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Days of the Week - In this Hebrew conversation you will learn the Hebrew names for the days of the week while finding out whether Eran will accept Liat’s invitation to see a movie.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 06 - Do You Know Danny?
item.description: Do You Know Danny? - They say it’s a small world, and when it comes to Israelis it’s especially true! Someone always knows someone. Find out if you know someone too!
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Do You Know Danny? - They say it’s a small world, and when it comes to Israelis it’s especially true! Someone always knows someone. Find out if you know someone too!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 07 - Fruits and Vegetables
item.description: Fruits and Vegetables - Israel is a true haven for fruit and vegetable lovers. Learn all the words in Hebrew for the ones that you like best. Warning: this Hebrew podcast lesson may cause extreme hunger!
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Fruits and Vegetables - Israel is a true haven for fruit and vegetable lovers. Learn all the words in Hebrew for the ones that you like best. Warning: this Hebrew podcast lesson may cause extreme hunger!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 08 - Hebrew Phone Call
item.description: Hebrew Phone Call - Every Israeli has a relative abroad. You might even be that relative! This podcast lesson will prepare you for your first Hebrew phone conversation with your Israeli family and friends.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Hebrew Phone Call - Every Israeli has a relative abroad. You might even be that relative! This podcast lesson will prepare you for your first Hebrew phone conversation with your Israeli family and friends.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 09 - The Four Seasons
item.description: The Four Seasons - Some like the rain, some like the sun, some prefer the Spring and some don’t care at all. What about you? Learn to discuss all that, in Hebrew, of course.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: The Four Seasons - Some like the rain, some like the sun, some prefer the Spring and some don’t care at all. What about you? Learn to discuss all that, in Hebrew, of course.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 10 - Visiting Israel
item.description: Visiting Israel - Learn Hebrew Pod invites you to visit Israel and practice your Hebrew in its homeland. Once in Israel, you will probably need to find yourself a nice hotel. This lesson will teach you how.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Visiting Israel - Learn Hebrew Pod invites you to visit Israel and practice your Hebrew in its homeland. Once in Israel, you will probably need to find yourself a nice hotel. This lesson will teach you how.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 11 - The Mediterranean Restaurant
item.description: The Mediterranean Restaurant - Once a week, Liat meets her sister and Eran meets his brother. In this online Hebrew lesson, you will find out what kind of restaurants they prefer and how you say Pizza and Humus in Hebrew.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: The Mediterranean Restaurant - Once a week, Liat meets her sister and Eran meets his brother. In this online Hebrew lesson, you will find out what kind of restaurants they prefer and how you say Pizza and Humus in Hebrew.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 12 - Liat's New Car
item.description: Liat's New Car - Liat just loves to drive her new car! In this Hebrew podcast lesson, we will join her as she meets the mechanic at the garage. And we’ll learn the words in Hebrew to help us purchase some essential parts.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Liat's New Car - Liat just loves to drive her new car! In this Hebrew podcast lesson, we will join her as she meets the mechanic at the garage. And we’ll learn the words in Hebrew to help us purchase some essential parts.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 13 - Purim Party
item.description: Purim Party - Finally it is Purim! Learn Hebrew Pod invites you to join Eran and Liat, as they plan which party to go to, what costumes to wear, and how very exciting…which of them is going to win the Great Purim Contest!!
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Purim Party - Finally it is Purim! Learn Hebrew Pod invites you to join Eran and Liat, as they plan which party to go to, what costumes to wear, and how very exciting…which of them is going to win the Great Purim Contest!!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 14 - Let's Count up to a Hundred!
item.description: Let's Count up to a Hundred! - Which bus should Eran take to get to the Old City? In This online Hebrew lesson, we will learn how to say the line number, count up to a hundred and the correct way of saying a phone number in Hebrew.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Let's Count up to a Hundred! - Which bus should Eran take to get to the Old City? In This online Hebrew lesson, we will learn how to say the line number, count up to a hundred and the correct way of saying a phone number in Hebrew.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 15 - The Seder Night
item.description: The Seder Night - It is the Spring time! The Holiday of Passover is just about to arrive. In this Hebrew podcast, Liat and Eran share with us how much they like this holiday and where and with whom they will spend the Seder Night this year.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: The Seder Night - It is the Spring time! The Holiday of Passover is just about to arrive. In this Hebrew podcast, Liat and Eran share with us how much they like this holiday and where and with whom they will spend the Seder Night this year.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 16 - Getting Directions
item.description: Getting Directions - How to get to Gezer Street? Is it to the left or to the right? How to get to the Plaza? Is it to the north or to the south? In this Hebrew podcast, Eran and Liat will teach us all the Hebrew we need for getting and giving directions.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Getting Directions - How to get to Gezer Street? Is it to the left or to the right? How to get to the Plaza? Is it to the north or to the south? In this Hebrew podcast, Eran and Liat will teach us all the Hebrew we need for getting and giving directions.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 17 - Independence Day
item.description: Independence Day - Yom Ha-Azzmaut is the birthday of Israel, yom ha-huledet shel medinat Israel. In this online Hebrew lesson we will learn how to say how old Israel is, what year she was born, and the Hebrew word for a flag.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Independence Day - Yom Ha-Azzmaut is the birthday of Israel, yom ha-huledet shel medinat Israel. In this online Hebrew lesson we will learn how to say how old Israel is, what year she was born, and the Hebrew word for a flag.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 18 - The Coffee Shop
item.description: The Coffee Shop - Israel is famous for its many coffee shops and delicious desserts. In this online Hebrew lesson, Eran and Liat will teach us the words in Hebrew to order coffee, a chocolate cake and (yum!)…a cheesecake.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: The Coffee Shop - Israel is famous for its many coffee shops and delicious desserts. In this online Hebrew lesson, Eran and Liat will teach us the words in Hebrew to order coffee, a chocolate cake and (yum!)…a cheesecake.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 19 - A Day at the Beach
item.description: A Day at the Beach - While Jonathan & Eran are waiting eagerly for the weekend, Liat decided to take a day off from work and spend it on the beach. Whom did she meet? What did she do? Was it fun? Join us to find out!
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: A Day at the Beach - While Jonathan & Eran are waiting eagerly for the weekend, Liat decided to take a day off from work and spend it on the beach. Whom did she meet? What did she do? Was it fun? Join us to find out!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 20 - The Soccer Game
item.description: The Soccer Game - One of the things Eran likes most is watching sports, especially soccer. Let's join him for this Hebrew lesson, as he spends some wonderful time at the stadium, watching the game between Israel and Brazil.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: The Soccer Game - One of the things Eran likes most is watching sports, especially soccer. Let's join him for this Hebrew lesson, as he spends some wonderful time at the stadium, watching the game between Israel and Brazil.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 21 - Let's Practice What We Know!
item.description: Let's Practice What We Know! - After Learn Hebrew Pod’s first sixty (shishim) lessons…it's time for a short review. It starts right here as we start practicing our Hebrew-language vocabulary – ozzar hamilim shelanu.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Let's Practice What We Know! - After Learn Hebrew Pod’s first sixty (shishim) lessons…it's time for a short review. It starts right here as we start practicing our Hebrew-language vocabulary – ozzar hamilim shelanu.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 22 - Let's Practice What We Know #2
item.description: Let's Practice What We Know #2 - After reviewing our vocabulary from Lessons echad ad eser (1 to 10), it's time to repeat and practice our grammar rules taken from these lessons. Hebrew grammar is Fun! Dikduk be-Ivrit ze kef!
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Let's Practice What We Know #2 - After reviewing our vocabulary from Lessons echad ad eser (1 to 10), it's time to repeat and practice our grammar rules taken from these lessons. Hebrew grammar is Fun! Dikduk be-Ivrit ze kef!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 23 - Let's Practice What We Know #3
item.description: Let's Practice What We Know #3 - In Lessons 11 to 20- achat esre ad esrim we learned more than 300 new Hebrew words -shlosh meot milim chadashot. Let's review them in the order of the Hebrew letters: the alef-bet.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Let's Practice What We Know #3 - In Lessons 11 to 20- achat esre ad esrim we learned more than 300 new Hebrew words -shlosh meot milim chadashot. Let's review them in the order of the Hebrew letters: the alef-bet.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 24 - Let's Practice What We Know #4
item.description: Let's Practice What We Know #4 - After reviewing our vocabulary from Lessons achat- esre ad esrim, it's time to repeat and practice our Hebrew grammar rules taken from these lessons. We know a lot! anachnu yod-im hamon!
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Let's Practice What We Know #4 - After reviewing our vocabulary from Lessons achat- esre ad esrim, it's time to repeat and practice our Hebrew grammar rules taken from these lessons. We know a lot! anachnu yod-im hamon!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 25 - At the Beauty Parlor
item.description: At the Beauty Parlor - Wow! The first lesson of our Intermediate Level Hebrew course! Who knew it could be such fun learning Hebrew online? And it might just make us beautiful too!!
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: At the Beauty Parlor - Wow! The first lesson of our Intermediate Level Hebrew course! Who knew it could be such fun learning Hebrew online? And it might just make us beautiful too!!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 26 - Rosh Hashana
item.description: Rosh Hashana - As the beginning of a New Year is the perfect time to look ahead, it is also a great time to master the future tense in Hebrew. Let's do that while enjoying the holiday with Liat's family and Eran's new girlfriend, Ronit!
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Rosh Hashana - As the beginning of a New Year is the perfect time to look ahead, it is also a great time to master the future tense in Hebrew. Let's do that while enjoying the holiday with Liat's family and Eran's new girlfriend, Ronit!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 27 - Sukkoth
item.description: Sukkoth - Sukkoth Is one of Liat and Eran's favorite holidays. It includes enjoyable customs such as the Four Species, as well as just hanging out in the Sukkah, watching the stars through the Schach. BTW…what is a Schach?
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Sukkoth - Sukkoth Is one of Liat and Eran's favorite holidays. It includes enjoyable customs such as the Four Species, as well as just hanging out in the Sukkah, watching the stars through the Schach. BTW…what is a Schach?
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 28 - At the Barbershop
item.description: At the Barbershop - Jonathan surprised Eran by inviting his acting partner Elad to join this lesson. Together they will act out a scene from their recent play and introduce us to a new Hebrew building block: Hitpa-el.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: At the Barbershop - Jonathan surprised Eran by inviting his acting partner Elad to join this lesson. Together they will act out a scene from their recent play and introduce us to a new Hebrew building block: Hitpa-el.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 29 - It's Fun to Run
item.description: It's Fun to Run - Jonathan loves to run…especially in the park or on the beach. Waiting for him to arrive, Eran and Liat discuss how we pronounce the Hebrew letters and Hebrew vowels. And what is a guttural letter anyway?
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: It's Fun to Run - Jonathan loves to run…especially in the park or on the beach. Waiting for him to arrive, Eran and Liat discuss how we pronounce the Hebrew letters and Hebrew vowels. And what is a guttural letter anyway?
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 30 - Going to the Movies
item.description: Going to the Movies - What could be better than learning Hebrew online with Eran, Liat & Jonathan…especially if we get to go to the movies! I wonder what movie we’ll see…and who we might run into there…
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Going to the Movies - What could be better than learning Hebrew online with Eran, Liat & Jonathan…especially if we get to go to the movies! I wonder what movie we’ll see…and who we might run into there…
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 31 - A Letter from Paris
item.description: A Letter from Paris - Take a stroll down the Champs-Élysées and along the Seine, visit the Eiffel Tower and the Louvre, experience the scents of Paris and the taste of fine wine. Let's read all about it in Hebrew, in Michal's letter to Liat.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: A Letter from Paris - Take a stroll down the Champs-Élysées and along the Seine, visit the Eiffel Tower and the Louvre, experience the scents of Paris and the taste of fine wine. Let's read all about it in Hebrew, in Michal's letter to Liat.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 32 - In Honor of the Hanukkah
item.description: In Honor of the Hanukkah - Chanuka is the Holiday of Lights. Let's join Eran Liat and Jonathan as they cook sufganyot and levivot while singing beautiful Holiday songs in Hebrew.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: In Honor of the Hanukkah - Chanuka is the Holiday of Lights. Let's join Eran Liat and Jonathan as they cook sufganyot and levivot while singing beautiful Holiday songs in Hebrew.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 33 - Going to the Doctor
item.description: Going to the Doctor - While recording Lesson shloshim ve-shalosh of Learn Hebrew Pod, Liat ve-Eran didn't feel well. Let's join them as they set up an appointment with a Doctor-tor lerofe…maybe getting a shot sounds better in Hebrew!
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Going to the Doctor - While recording Lesson shloshim ve-shalosh of Learn Hebrew Pod, Liat ve-Eran didn't feel well. Let's join them as they set up an appointment with a Doctor-tor lerofe…maybe getting a shot sounds better in Hebrew!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 34 - Finding a Home for Luli
item.description: Finding a Home for Luli - For this lesson's recording, Eran arrived to the Learn Hebrew Pod Studio with a new friend, a puppy dog named Luli – kalba gura beshem Luli. Will Liat be surprised when she meets them? Join us to find out!
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Finding a Home for Luli - For this lesson's recording, Eran arrived to the Learn Hebrew Pod Studio with a new friend, a puppy dog named Luli – kalba gura beshem Luli. Will Liat be surprised when she meets them? Join us to find out!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 35 - Going to the Bank
item.description: Going to the Bank - Eran just received a paycheck for his last performances in Jerusalem. Let's join him at the bank to deposit the money and learn how to count in Hebrew, to up to a Million…and more!
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Going to the Bank - Eran just received a paycheck for his last performances in Jerusalem. Let's join him at the bank to deposit the money and learn how to count in Hebrew, to up to a Million…and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 36 - The Wedding
item.description: The Wedding - As Jonathan and Eran are struggling with the Hebrew building block Nifal, Liat arrives at the Learn Hebrew Pod studio, with some wonderful news. Most importantly…You are also invited!
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: The Wedding - As Jonathan and Eran are struggling with the Hebrew building block Nifal, Liat arrives at the Learn Hebrew Pod studio, with some wonderful news. Most importantly…You are also invited!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 37 - Eran's New Apartment
item.description: Eran's New Apartment - Liat visits Eran badira hachadasha. In this Hebrew lesson we will learn to say bedroom, kitchen and many more home-related words, while at the same time, delving deeper into the world of prepositions.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Eran's New Apartment - Liat visits Eran badira hachadasha. In this Hebrew lesson we will learn to say bedroom, kitchen and many more home-related words, while at the same time, delving deeper into the world of prepositions.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 38 - At the Clothing Store
item.description: At the Clothing Store - Eran is invited to a very important dinner with….as a part of his preparations, he buys a new shirt - chulzza chadasha. Let's join him as he shops while learning more about Hebrew prepositions!
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: At the Clothing Store - Eran is invited to a very important dinner with….as a part of his preparations, he buys a new shirt - chulzza chadasha. Let's join him as he shops while learning more about Hebrew prepositions!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 39 - The Concert
item.description: The Concert - Eran and Liat had a great time yesterday, they went to a concert and heard a Beethoven's Symphony, simfonya shel Bethoven. In this lesson they discuss music, orchestration and the Piel building block.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: The Concert - Eran and Liat had a great time yesterday, they went to a concert and heard a Beethoven's Symphony, simfonya shel Bethoven. In this lesson they discuss music, orchestration and the Piel building block.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 40 - Anne Frank: The Diary of a Young Girl
item.description: Anne Frank: The Diary of a Young Girl - The Diary of a Young Girl - Please join us for our remembrance of the Holocaust. We will read from the Hebrew Language edition of “The Diary of Anne Frank” and share stories as a memorial…and as a tribute to those who helped.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Anne Frank: The Diary of a Young Girl - The Diary of a Young Girl - Please join us for our remembrance of the Holocaust. We will read from the Hebrew Language edition of “The Diary of Anne Frank” and share stories as a memorial…and as a tribute to those who helped.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 41 - Once Upon a Time
item.description: Once Upon a Time - Welcome to the magical world of legends and fairytales: Waiting for you in this enchanted Hebrew lesson are beautiful princesses, charming princes, monsters, sorcerers, giants, and dwarfs.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Once Upon a Time - Welcome to the magical world of legends and fairytales: Waiting for you in this enchanted Hebrew lesson are beautiful princesses, charming princes, monsters, sorcerers, giants, and dwarfs.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 42 - Becoming a Handyman
item.description: Becoming a Handyman - Now that Eran has gotten settled in his new apartment, it’s time to make a few improvements. In this Hebrew lesson we will find out if he can become a ‘do-it-yourself’er. Maybe we can too!
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Becoming a Handyman - Now that Eran has gotten settled in his new apartment, it’s time to make a few improvements. In this Hebrew lesson we will find out if he can become a ‘do-it-yourself’er. Maybe we can too!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 43 - Running Errands
item.description: Running Errands - Running to the bank, the post office, the supermarket... Whether you do your errands in English or in Hebrew, they are the stuff of daily life. Let’s see how quickly we can get them all done! (In Hebrew kamuvan)
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Running Errands - Running to the bank, the post office, the supermarket... Whether you do your errands in English or in Hebrew, they are the stuff of daily life. Let’s see how quickly we can get them all done! (In Hebrew kamuvan)
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 44 - The Computer Repair Shop
item.description: The Computer Repair Shop - Computers have changed the world…and our lives! Let’s learn the Hebrew words we need to keep them working at their best. And…our last-but-not-least Hebrew building block--Hufal!
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: The Computer Repair Shop - Computers have changed the world…and our lives! Let’s learn the Hebrew words we need to keep them working at their best. And…our last-but-not-least Hebrew building block--Hufal!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 45 - Let's Practice What We Know #5
item.description: Let's Practice What We Know #5 - How do you remember 800 new Hebrew words? Practice, practice, practice!! So let’s join Eran, Liat, and Jonathan as we begin our Intermediate Level review!
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Let's Practice What We Know #5 - How do you remember 800 new Hebrew words? Practice, practice, practice!! So let’s join Eran, Liat, and Jonathan as we begin our Intermediate Level review!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 46 - Let's Practice What We Know #6
item.description: Let's Practice What We Know #6 - Seven building blocks . . . lots and lots of Hebrew verbs! There’s no time like the present to review the past (tense, that is) with Learn Hebrew Pod!
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Let's Practice What We Know #6 - Seven building blocks . . . lots and lots of Hebrew verbs! There’s no time like the present to review the past (tense, that is) with Learn Hebrew Pod!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 47 - Let's Practice What We Know #7
item.description: Let's Practice What We Know #7 - To review 800 Hebrew words, this is our quest. With practice, practice, practice, we’re sure to have success!
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Let's Practice What We Know #7 - To review 800 Hebrew words, this is our quest. With practice, practice, practice, we’re sure to have success!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 48 - Let's Practice What We Know #8
item.description: Let's Practice What We Know #8 - Don’t forget the past, look forward to the future. But today, Learn Hebrew Pod invites you to be present in the moment…as we review the Hebrew present tense!
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Let's Practice What We Know #8 - Don’t forget the past, look forward to the future. But today, Learn Hebrew Pod invites you to be present in the moment…as we review the Hebrew present tense!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 49 - Let's Practice What We Know #9
item.description: Let's Practice What We Know #9 - How well do Liat and Eran know Jonathan? Can they guess his topic for reviewing the words from Lessons 39 to 44? More important…how well do you know the words???
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Let's Practice What We Know #9 - How well do Liat and Eran know Jonathan? Can they guess his topic for reviewing the words from Lessons 39 to 44? More important…how well do you know the words???

item.title: 50 - Let's Practice What We Know #10
item.description: Let's Practice What We Know #10 - As we reach the end of the Intermediate Level, we’ve got our eyes on the future! On all that we will learn as Advanced Hebrew students…and the future tense!!
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Let's Practice What We Know #10 - As we reach the end of the Intermediate Level, we’ve got our eyes on the future! On all that we will learn as Advanced Hebrew students…and the future tense!!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 51 - Movin’ On Up
item.description: Movin’ On Up - As we reach the first Advanced Level lesson, there’s no question that our Hebrew is on its way to new heights! Let’s catch up on all the news and take a look at what’s ahead. The sky’s the limit!
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Movin’ On Up - As we reach the first Advanced Level lesson, there’s no question that our Hebrew is on its way to new heights! Let’s catch up on all the news and take a look at what’s ahead. The sky’s the limit!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 52 - Eliezer Ben-Yehuda
item.description: Eliezer Ben-Yehuda - The Hebrew we speak today is actually less than 200 years old…but born of the language of Biblical Hebrew. Let’s find out how it came to be…and meet the Reviver of the Hebrew Language.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Eliezer Ben-Yehuda - The Hebrew we speak today is actually less than 200 years old…but born of the language of Biblical Hebrew. Let’s find out how it came to be…and meet the Reviver of the Hebrew Language.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 53 - A 3 a.m. Phone Call
item.description: A 3 a.m. Phone Call - For the second time, Liat has arrived at the Learn Hebrew Pod studio singing and dancing. Last time, she announced the engagement of her brother Amir. And today?
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: A 3 a.m. Phone Call - For the second time, Liat has arrived at the Learn Hebrew Pod studio singing and dancing. Last time, she announced the engagement of her brother Amir. And today?
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 54 - The Date
item.description: The Date - We already know that Dan, our Advanced Level teacher, is a great Hebrew lover. But … is that the only love of his life? Join us in this lesson to find out what Cupid has to say about it ….
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: The Date - We already know that Dan, our Advanced Level teacher, is a great Hebrew lover. But … is that the only love of his life? Join us in this lesson to find out what Cupid has to say about it ….
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 55 - Makes the World Go Round
item.description: Makes the World Go Round - This is Jonathan’s turn to show up at the Learn Hebrew Pod recording studio, happy and content, sameach umeushar. Let’s join Liat and Dan as they try to find out what is the reason for that.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Makes the World Go Round - This is Jonathan’s turn to show up at the Learn Hebrew Pod recording studio, happy and content, sameach umeushar. Let’s join Liat and Dan as they try to find out what is the reason for that.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 56 - The Job Interview
item.description: The Job Interview - Thanks to the wonders of the Internet, Liat had a chance to meet Yael, her very good friend from high school. While they chat and touch base, Liat comes up with a great idea for this lesson’s dialogue...
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: The Job Interview - Thanks to the wonders of the Internet, Liat had a chance to meet Yael, her very good friend from high school. While they chat and touch base, Liat comes up with a great idea for this lesson’s dialogue...
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 57 - London Town
item.description: London Town - Dan’s just returned from Jolly Old England and can’t wait to tell us all about his time in London! Where did he go? What did he see? And what is his absolute favorite thing about this unique and exciting city?
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: London Town - Dan’s just returned from Jolly Old England and can’t wait to tell us all about his time in London! Where did he go? What did he see? And what is his absolute favorite thing about this unique and exciting city?
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 58 - A Visit to the University
item.description: A Visit to the University - One of Learn Hebrew Pod’s students has written to us with some incredible news…kol hakavod, James! In this lesson, we’ll hear all about his big decision and help him to get ready for life on campus.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: A Visit to the University - One of Learn Hebrew Pod’s students has written to us with some incredible news…kol hakavod, James! In this lesson, we’ll hear all about his big decision and help him to get ready for life on campus.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 59 - A Day at the Gym
item.description: A Day at the Gym - They say there’s no better way to stick with a new exercise program than to share it with a friend. Let’s find out what Dan and Liat have been up to lately to stay fit and healthy!
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: A Day at the Gym - They say there’s no better way to stick with a new exercise program than to share it with a friend. Let’s find out what Dan and Liat have been up to lately to stay fit and healthy!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 60 - LHP at the Luna Park
item.description: LHP at the Luna Park - It seems that one of Learn Hebrew Pod’s teachers is crazy for rollercoasters. Can you guess who it is? Join us to find out ...and to see if the others will be able to keep up!!
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: LHP at the Luna Park - It seems that one of Learn Hebrew Pod’s teachers is crazy for rollercoasters. Can you guess who it is? Join us to find out ...and to see if the others will be able to keep up!!
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 61 - Let's Get Civical
item.description: Let's Get Civical - So many suggestions for lesson topics from our students . . . and for this lesson, Dan, Liat & Jonathan chose a very special one! Join Learn Hebrew Pod on our tour of the Israeli government.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain
item.itunes:summary: Let's Get Civical - So many suggestions for lesson topics from our students . . . and for this lesson, Dan, Liat & Jonathan chose a very special one! Join Learn Hebrew Pod on our tour of the Israeli government.
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to speak Herbew as it is spoken in Israel

item.title: 62 - First Aid at the Pharmacy
item.description: First Aid at the Pharmacy - Liat is soon to be off on an exciting adventure (and with someone very special, too!) But before her travels take her too far afield, let’s join the ever-responsible Liat on a short trip to the pharmacy.
item.itunes:author: Language Fountain

channel.media:description: Learn Hebrew Pod - The first conversational Hebrew course by podcasts. Learn to speak conversational Hebrew the way it is spoken in Israel. Practice your Hebrew pronunciation and accent while expanding your vocabulary and conversational skills with sabra
